CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT(AR_Status__c) = "Dunning Activated", TODAY() - Dunning_Requested__c , IF( TEXT(AR_Status__c) = "Considering Collections", TODAY() - Dunning_Requested__c, IF( TEXT(AR_Status__c) = "In Collections", TODAY() - Dunning_Requested__c,
Dunning_Removed_Reversed__c - Dunning_Requested__c)))
CustomField.label: Days in Dunning
